        Parameters:

      • updateClimate

        public void updateClimate(Climate.TypeClimate newClimate)
        If there are animals, which does not there in enclosure, they will be updating by zoo. At the create Zoo, he automate sign to observer to climate.

      • getProfit

        public float getProfit()
        Computes profit from zoo for day. Uses Pattern Composite for collection profit. Just before collection will be checking of the state of animals.
        Specified by:
        getProfit in interface Profitable
        Returns:
        general profit form zoo and his parts(animals).
        See Also:

        Returns:
